text: Bakerganj is an upazila in the Barisal district of Bangladesh. ==population== According to the 2011 census, the total population of Bakerganj upazila is 3,13,845. Of these, 1,48,925 are males and 1,64,920 are females. The total number of families is 71,536 ==Reference== Category:Subdivisions of Bangladesh Category:Barisal Division
title: Bakerganj Upazila
